title: League Netflix Series
body:
Just a thought I had since everybody wants a league anime or cartoon or legit anything I thought to myself why don't they team up with Netflix and make something just like they did with marvel as I was reading the recent lux issue the art style looked a lot like the Castlevania art style from the animation that Netflix did 

if you agree on this upvote and hopefully it gets big enough and we get a rioter to respond  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
